analyzed: gnyan dang grong pa che rnams kyis //
translated: The kinsmen, and the citizens,

original: gsol ba to sya bh'unmoo n'i ni r'a h'a ro di na tra yam //
analyzed: gsol ba to sya bh'unmoo n'i ni r'a h'a ro di na tra yam //
translated: All entreated him, but he did not waver from his resolve.🔽The king said, Let him go, but after three years,

original: r'a dza bho g'i ta pa sv'i b'a dz'i ba tve sha ni dzatstshe y'a //
analyzed: r'a dza bho g'i ta pa sv'i b'a dz'i ba tve sha ni dzatstshe y'a //
translated: He will return, having seen the world.

original: k'a m'a nu bartt'i lo ko ya mi tyu tsu: sa tsi b'a nri bam //🔽sa ka thanytsi da nu dzny'a ta:s'a shru ne tre na bh'u bhu dz'a //🔽ya yoo btab kyang nyin gsum de //
analyzed: k'a m'a nu bartt'i lo ko ya mi tyu tsu: sa tsi b'a nri bam // sa ka thanytsi da nu dzny'a ta:s'a shru ne tre na bh'u bhu dz'a // ya yoo btab kyang nyin gsum de //
translated: The king said, I will not go to the world of the dead.🔽I know that you are a man, said the king, but you are not my equal.

original: zas dang smra ba med par gyur //
analyzed: zas dang smra ba med par gyur //
translated: The king said to the ministers: He does not eat, he does not speak.

original: rgyal por spyod dam dka' thub can //
analyzed: rgyal por spyod dam dka' thub can //
translated: The ministers said: He is either a king or an ascetic.

original: 'di ni rang gi 'dun pas 'tsho //🔽'jig rten 'di ni 'dod rjes 'jug / ces pa blon pos rgyal la smras //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi 'dun pas 'tsho // 'jig rten 'di ni 'dod rjes 'jug / ces pa blon pos rgyal la smras //
translated: He is living according to his own will.🔽 The king said: The world follows desire.

original: mchi ma dang bcas sa skyong gis //
analyzed: mchi ma dang bcas sa skyong gis //
translated: The king, with tears, said: What shall I do?🔽 The ministers said: Let him be given a boon.

original: ji zhig ltar stas gnang nas des //
analyzed: ji zhig ltar stas gnang nas des //
